* [.ac-gn-menuicon-bread .ac-gn-menuicon-bread-top]##[.ac-gn-menuicon-bread-crust .ac-gn-menuicon-bread-crust-top]####[.ac-gn-menuicon-bread .ac-gn-menuicon-bread-bottom]##[.ac-gn-menuicon-bread-crust .ac-gn-menuicon-bread-crust-bottom]####link:#ac-gn-menustate[[.ac-gn-menuanchor-label]#Global
Nav Open Menu#]link:#[[.ac-gn-menuanchor-label]#Global Nav Close Menu#]
* https://www.apple.com/uk/[[.ac-gn-link-text]#Apple#]
* {blank}
+
[[ac-gn-bag-small]]
https://www.apple.com/uk/shop/goto/bag[[.ac-gn-link-text]#Shopping
Bag#][.ac-gn-bag-badge]##[.ac-gn-bag-badge-separator]####[.ac-gn-bag-badge-number]####[.ac-gn-bag-badge-unit]#+###

[.ac-gn-bagview-caret .ac-gn-bagview-caret-large]##

[[app]]
[[howto-section]]
[[content]]
[[howto-title]]
== Apple security updates (2015)

This document lists security updates for Apple software.

[[sections]]
=== About Apple security updates

For our customers' protection, Apple doesn't disclose, discuss or
confirm security issues until an investigation has occurred and patches
or releases are available.

For more information about security, see
the https://www.apple.com/support/security/[Apple Product
Security] page.

[.callout]#This document describes updates and releases from 2015 only.
Recent https://support.apple.com/en-gb/HT201222[Apple security updates]
are also available.#

[[apple-security-updates-2015]]
=== Apple security updates (2015)

[[tableWraper]]
[cols=",,",]
|===
|Name and information link |Available for |Release date

|https://support.apple.com/en-gb/HT205653[Security Update 2015-006
Yosemite] |OS X Yosemite v10.10.5 |11 Dec 2015

|https://support.apple.com/en-gb/HT205636[iTunes 12.3.2] |Windows 7 and
later |11 Dec 2015

|https://support.apple.com/en-gb/HT205642[Xcode 7.2] |OS X Yosemite
v10.10.5 and later |8 Dec 2015

|https://support.apple.com/en-gb/HT205639[Safari 9.0.2] |OS X Mavericks
v10.9.5, OS X Yosemite v10.10.5 and OS X El Capitan v10.11.2 |8 Dec 2015

|https://support.apple.com/en-gb/HT205641[watchOS 2.1] |Apple Watch
Sport, Apple Watch, Apple Watch Edition and Apple Watch Hermes |8 Dec
2015

|https://support.apple.com/en-gb/HT205637[OS X El Capitan 10.11.2,
Security Update 2015-005 Yosemite and Security Update 2015-008
Mavericks] |OS X Mavericks v10.9.5, OS X Yosemite v10.10.5, OS X El
Capitan v10.11 and v10.11.1 |8 Dec 2015

|https://support.apple.com/en-gb/HT205640[tvOS 9.1] |Apple TV (4th
generation) |8 Dec 2015

|https://support.apple.com/en-gb/HT205635[iOS 9.2] |iPhone 4s and later,
iPod touch (5th generation) and later, iPad 2 and later |8 Dec 2015

|https://support.apple.com/en-gb/HT205376[OS X Server 5.0.15] |OS X
Yosemite v10.10.5, OS X El Capitan v10.11.1 and later |21 Oct 2015

|https://support.apple.com/en-gb/HT205379[Xcode 7.1] |OS X Yosemite
v10.10.5 and later |21 Oct 2015

|https://support.apple.com/en-gb/HT205317[Mac EFI Security Update
2015-002] |OS X Mavericks v10.9.5 |21 Oct 2015

|https://support.apple.com/en-gb/HT205372[iTunes 12.3.1] |Windows 7 and
later |21 Oct 2015

|https://support.apple.com/en-gb/HT205375[OS X El Capitan 10.11.1,
Security Update 2015-004 Yosemite and Security Update 2015-007
Mavericks] |OS X Mavericks v10.9.5, OS X Yosemite v10.10.5 and OS X El
Capitan v10.11 |21 Oct 2015

|https://support.apple.com/en-gb/HT205377[Safari 9.0.1] |OS X Mavericks
v10.9.5, OS X Yosemite v10.10.5 and OS X El Capitan v10.11.1 |21 Oct
2015

|https://support.apple.com/en-gb/HT205378[watchOS 2.0.1] |Apple Watch
Sport, Apple Watch, Apple Watch Edition and Apple Watch Hermes |21 Oct
2015

|https://support.apple.com/en-gb/HT205370[iOS 9.1] |iPhone 4s and later,
iPod touch (5th generation) and later, iPad 2 and later |21 Oct 2015

|https://support.apple.com/en-gb/HT205373[Keynote 6.6, Pages 5.6,
Numbers 3.6, iWork for iOS 2.6] |OS X Yosemite v10.10.4 and later, iOS
8.4 and later |15 Oct 2015

|https://support.apple.com/en-gb/HT205267[OS X El Capitan 10.11] |Mac OS
X v10.6.8 and later |30 Sep 2015

|https://support.apple.com/en-gb/HT205265[Safari 9] |OS X Mavericks
v10.9.5, OS X Yosemite v10.10.5 and OS X El Capitan v10.11 |30 Sep 2015

|https://support.apple.com/en-gb/HT205284[iOS 9.0.2] |iPhone 4s and
later, iPod touch (5th generation) and later, iPad 2 and later |30 Sep
2015

|https://support.apple.com/en-gb/HT205213[watchOS 2] |Apple Watch Sport,
Apple Watch and Apple Watch Edition |21 Sep 2015

|https://support.apple.com/en-gb/HT205219[OS X Server v5.0.3] |OS X
Yosemite v10.10.5 and later |16 Sep 2015

|https://support.apple.com/en-gb/HT205221[iTunes 12.3] |Windows 7 and
later |16 Sep 2015

|https://support.apple.com/en-gb/HT205217[Xcode 7.0] |OS X Yosemite
v10.10.4 and later |16 Sep 2015

|https://support.apple.com/en-gb/HT205212[iOS 9] |iPhone 4s and later,
iPod touch (5th generation) and later, iPad 2 and later |16 Sep 2015

|https://support.apple.com/en-gb/HT205046[QuickTime 7.7.8] |Windows 7
and Windows Vista |20 Aug 2015

|https://support.apple.com/en-gb/HT205032[OS X Server v4.1.5] |OS X
Yosemite v10.10.5 and later |13 Aug 2015

|https://support.apple.com/en-gb/HT205030[iOS 8.4.1] |iPhone 4s and
later, iPod touch (5th generation) and later, iPad 2 and later |13 Aug
2015

|https://support.apple.com/en-gb/HT205031[OS X Yosemite 10.10.5 and
Security Update 2015-006] |OS X Mountain Lion v10.8.5, OS X Mavericks
v10.9.5, OS X Yosemite v10.10 to v10.10.4 |13 Aug 2015

|https://support.apple.com/en-gb/HT205033[Safari 8.0.8, Safari 7.1.8 and
Safari 6.2.8] |OS X Mountain Lion v10.8.5, OS X Mavericks v10.9.5 and OS
X Yosemite v10.10.4 |13 Aug 2015

|https://support.apple.com/en-gb/HT204947[QuickTime 7.7.7] |Windows 7
and Windows Vista |30 Jun 2015

|https://support.apple.com/en-gb/HT204949[iTunes 12.2] |Windows 8 and
Windows 7 |30 Jun 2015

|https://support.apple.com/en-gb/HT204950[Safari 8.0.7, Safari 7.1.7 and
Safari 6.2.7] |OS X Mountain Lion v10.8.5, OS X Mavericks v10.9.5 and OS
X Yosemite v10.10.3 |30 Jun 2015

|https://support.apple.com/en-gb/HT204934[Mac EFI Security Update
2015-001] |OS X Mountain Lion v10.8.5, OS X Mavericks v10.9.5 |30 Jun
2015

|https://support.apple.com/en-gb/HT204942[OS X Yosemite 10.10.4 and
Security Update 2015-005] |OS X Mountain Lion v10.8.5, OS X Mavericks
v10.9.5, OS X Yosemite v10.10 to v10.10.3 |30 Jun 2015

|https://support.apple.com/en-gb/HT204941[iOS 8.4] |iPhone 4s and later,
iPod touch (5th generation) and later, iPad 2 and later |30 Jun 2015

|https://support.apple.com/en-gb/HT204870[Watch OS 1.0.1] |Apple Watch
Sport, Apple Watch and Apple Watch Edition |19 May 2015

|https://support.apple.com/en-gb/HT204826[Safari 8.0.6, Safari 7.1.6 and
Safari 6.2.6] |OS X Mountain Lion v10.8.5, OS X Mavericks v10.9.5 and OS
X Yosemite v10.10.3 |06 May 2015

|https://support.apple.com/en-gb/HT204201[OS X Server 4.1] |OS X
Yosemite v10.10 and later |08 Apr 2015

|https://support.apple.com/en-gb/HT204663[Xcode 6.3] |OS X Yosemite
v10.10 and later |08 Apr 2015

|https://support.apple.com/en-gb/HT204662[Apple TV 7.2] |Apple TV 3rd
generation and later |08 Apr 2015

|https://support.apple.com/en-gb/HT204661[iOS 8.3] |iPhone 4s and later,
iPod touch (5th generation) and later, iPad 2 and later |08 Apr 2015

|https://support.apple.com/en-gb/HT204659[OS X Yosemite 10.10.3 and
Security Update 2015-004] |OS X Mountain Lion v10.8.5, OS X Mavericks
v10.9.5, OS X Yosemite v10.10 to v10.10.2 |08 Apr 2015

|https://support.apple.com/en-gb/HT204658[Safari 8.0.5, Safari 7.1.5 and
Safari 6.2.5] |OS X Mountain Lion v10.8.5, OS X Mavericks v10.9.5 and OS
X Yosemite v10.10.2 |08 Apr 2015

|https://support.apple.com/en-gb/HT204563[Security Update 2015-003] |OS
X Yosemite v10.10.2 |19 Mar 2015

|https://support.apple.com/en-gb/HT204560[Safari 8.0.4, Safari 7.1.4 and
Safari 6.2.4] |OS X Mountain Lion v10.8.5, OS X Mavericks v10.9.5 and OS
X Yosemite v10.10.2 |17 Mar 2015

|https://support.apple.com/en-gb/HT204427[Xcode 6.2] |OS X Mavericks
v10.9.4 and later |09 Mar 2015

|https://support.apple.com/en-gb/HT204413[Security Update 2015-002] |OS
X Mountain Lion v10.8.5, OS X Mavericks v10.9.5 and OS X Yosemite
v10.10.2 |09 Mar 2015

|https://support.apple.com/en-gb/HT204426[Apple TV 7.1] |Apple TV 3rd
generation and later |09 Mar 2015

|https://support.apple.com/en-gb/HT204423[iOS 8.2] |iPhone 4s and later,
iPod touch (5th generation) and later, iPad 2 and later |09 Mar 2015

|https://support.apple.com/en-gb/HT204244[OS X v10.10.2 and Security
Update 2015-001] |OS X Mountain Lion v10.8.5, OS X Mavericks v10.9.5, OS
X Yosemite v10.10 and v10.10.1 |27 Jan 2015

|https://support.apple.com/en-gb/HT204243[Safari 8.0.3, Safari 7.1.3 and
Safari 6.2.3] |OS X Mountain Lion v10.8.5, OS X Mavericks v10.9.5, OS X
Yosemite v10.10.1 |27 Jan 2015

|https://support.apple.com/en-gb/HT204245[iOS 8.1.3] |iPhone 4s and
later, iPod touch (5th generation) and later, iPad 2 and later |27 Jan
2015

|https://support.apple.com/en-gb/HT204246[Apple TV 7.0.3] |Apple TV 3rd
generation and later |27 Jan 2015
|===

For information about earlier security updates, see these documents:

* https://support.apple.com/en-gb/HT205762[Apple security updates
(2014)]
* https://support.apple.com/en-gb/HT205759[Apple security updates
(2013)]
* https://support.apple.com/en-gb/HT204611[Apple security updates (2011
to 2012)]
* https://support.apple.com/en-gb/HT5165[Apple security updates (2010)]
* https://support.apple.com/en-gb/HT4218[Apple security updates (15 Jan
2008 to 03 Dec 2009)]
* https://support.apple.com/en-gb/HT1263[Apple security updates (25 Jan
2005 to 21 Dec 2007)]
* https://support.apple.com/en-gb/HT1646[Apple security updates (03 Oct
2003 to 11 Jan 2005)]
* https://support.apple.com/kb/TA22413?locale=en_GB[Apple security
updates (August 2003 and earlier)]

Information about products not manufactured by Apple, or independent
websites not controlled or tested by Apple, is provided without
recommendation or endorsement. Apple assumes no responsibility with
regard to the selection, performance or use of third-party websites or
products. Apple makes no representations regarding third-party website
accuracy or reliability. http://support.apple.com/en-gb/HT2693[Contact
the vendor] for additional information.

Published Date: February 29, 2020
